review_text: I have fine and limp hair that gets oily very easily, but then again can be dry at the ends and gets tangled. I have been using this for a few weeks now and I have to say that I absolutely love it. Leaves my hair clean, bouncy, soft, and detangled. It felt like I had more hair after a few uses. My hair doesn't get as oily on 2nd day hair. I definitely noticed a difference when I used a different shampoo and conditioner for one day and my hair was limp and oily. Never going back to anything else either than this stuff. Wish I had found it sooner.
review_title: I have fine and limp hair that gets oily very easily, but then again can be dry at the ends and gets tangled. My hair doesn't get as oily on 2nd day hair. I definitely noticed a difference when I used a different shampoo and conditioner for one day and my hair was limp and oily. Never going back to anything else either than this stuff. Wish I had found it sooner.

review_text: I pretty much have thin hair and it gets tangely really easy but ever sense I got the New Garnier Frutis Full and Plush shampoo and conditioner, I have had really good results such as 1. when I use it and wake up the next day I hardly have to use my brush as hard, I could even use a comb, 2. My hair has been less tangely and knotty, and 3. it looks and feels better than usual and isn't oily, not to mention it smells great. But I only have the shampoo and conditioner for now so I don't have the best results yet. but it is an amazing product I can run my fingers though my hair without any knots stopping them!

review_text: I've got a sample of the shampoo and as I have a long damaged hair, it was particularly interesting to test it. The shampoo sample is 10 ml (0.34 fl oz) and I halved it, because 5 ml was just enough even for long hair. It lathers very nicely, I could spread it evenly throughout my hair and massage into roots. The consistency of the product is just right. It is also very easy to rinse out. It completely removes all the build-up (taking into consideration that I have oily scalp) leaving the clean feeling of the hair.It is a real pleasure to wash the hair with Garnier Fructis shampoo because the scent is so fruity, so delicious, sweet but not too sweet (I mean it is perfect!). So I was really satisfied with the product!
review_title: I've got a sample of the shampoo and as I have a long damaged hair, it was particularly interesting to test it. The shampoo sample is 10 ml (0.34 fl oz) and I halved it, because 5 ml was just enough even for long hair. It lathers very nicely, I could spread it evenly throughout my hair and massage into roots. The consistency of the product is just right. It is also very easy to rinse out. It completely removes all the build-up (taking into consideration that I have oily scalp) leaving the clean feeling of the hair.It is a real pleasure to wash the hair with Garnier Fructis shampoo because the scent is so fruity, so delicious, sweet but not too sweet (I mean it is perfect!). So I was really satisfied with the product!

review_text: ve had the best results using just a few drops after showering, then using a little styling mousse to finish. The first time I used too much oil (by itself, no other products) and it absolutely left a nasty greasy feeling to my hair. The key is to use just a little! It smells wonderful and helps keep my hair soft, but I find it doesn't do the job by itself. I still get frizz and curls unless I use other styling products after the oil. I've had much better results with the Garnier sleek and shine leave-in conditioner. It seems to do the whole job by itself and leaves my hair feeling great for days. I plan to buy more of that instead.
